title: Transfers
body: So when are transfers comming back?

replies.body: Looks like there haven't been any recent updates in [**HollyMonsters post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) regarding the status of account transfers. At this point it'll still be a few more weeks it seems =(.
